ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_component is a type of . An Interconnect_module_component may be an .
ext_description.note: The Interconnect_module_component can be, for example, a circuit board in an assembly. Alternatively, it could be the substrate for a multi-chip module. This entity is included specifically so that the assembly design definition can be queried directly to determine which component in the assembly is the substrate. The Interconnect_module_component is likely the target of connectivity requirement information as allocated to various components. An Interconnect_module_component does not include all the internal details of the design of the .

ext_description.p: specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_component.
ext_description.note: The derived_from specifies the definitions of the terminals and other interface elements of the .

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_component_join_terminal is a type of that is some aspect of a generic participating in connectivity for a . This Interconnect_component_join_terminal is defined in-situ.
ext_description.example: An example of an Interconnect_component_join_terminal is a mechanical conductive fastener that attaches a flexible wire lead lug to the pcb. Current flows through the fastener because it is part of the conduction path for a signal.
A plain wire is considered to be a mechanical component as well. There is no associated with it. This is the opposite end of the wire from that defined for the same wire in .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_component_join_terminal.
specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_component_join_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If the source system contains the data, then the data shall be provided.
The combination of the name inherited from and the associated_component inherited from shall be unique within a population of Interconnect_component_join_terminal.

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_component_interface_terminal is a type of that is some aspect of a generic participate in a connection for a . The Interconnect_component_interface_terminal is defined in-situ. There is no associated with it.
ext_description.example: An example of an Interconnect_component_interface_terminal is a mechanical conductive fastener that attaches a flexible wire lead lug to the pcb. Current flows through the fastener because it is part of the conduction path for a signal.

A plain wire is considered to be an interconnect component as well. This Interconnect_component_interface_terminal is defined in-situ. There is no associated with it. This is the opposite end of the wire from that defined for the same wire in .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_component_interface_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
The combination of the name inherited from and the inherited from shall be unique within a population of Interconnect_component_interface_terminal.

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_component_terminal is a type of . An Interconnect_module_component_terminal may be an or an . A member of Interconnect_module_component_terminal may be referenced by a member of to describe the partial or complete implementation of a connection defined as a requirement by a member of .
ext_description.example: Figure 1 illustrates the relationship between an Interconnect_module_component_terminal and its mating feature in an assembly.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_component_terminal.
specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_component_terminal.

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_component_surface_feature is a type of . An Interconnect_module_component_surface_feature is a surface or a segment of the edge of the identified for assembly purposes. The definition attribute inherited from shall specify a type of . The attribute inherited from shall specify a member of . An Interconnect_module_component_surface_feature may also be an , but shall not be any other type of .
ext_description.note: The entire primary or secondary surface of the may be considered to be a feature in this usage.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_component_surface_feature.
